title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6180.6 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6180.6 - Exemptions

State Regulations
(a) Upon a written
request by a city's chief executive officer, the commissioner of the Division
of Criminal Justice Services, after consulting with the Department of Motor

Vehicles, may authorize the use of an alternative parking ticket if it is
determined that the use of an alternative parking ticket is not inconsistent
with and will not diminish the effectiveness of the program. (b) Upon a written application of the city's
chief executive officer, the Department of Motor Vehicles may authorize, for a
limited time, the use of any notice that does not contain all the information
required by section
6180.5
(c)(2)
of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6180.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
